resources.string:
Nmap Wrapper for Android
Created by Werebug (https://werebug.com)

This is a wrapper around the Nmap network scanner cross-compiled for Android.
This is not an official Nmap application.

Prepend your command with sudo to run as root on rooted phones. For example:
sudo nmap -O 192.168.1.1

Source code, cross-compilation instructions and configuration are available at https://github.com/ruvolof/anmap-wrapper. Feel free to contribute or report bugs on Github.
The flag %1$s is reserved for correct functioning of Nmap Wrapper for Android.
